programme.desc: Leicester Tigers v Gloucester (Kick-off 7.45pm). Coverage of the match at Mattioli Woods Welford Road. The Tigers have made a steady, if unspectacular, start to the campaign as they look to go one better than last season when they were runners-up to Bath, while Gloucester have struggled so far.

programme.title: The Ashes
programme.desc: Australia v England. Action from day three of the Third Test in the five-match series, held at Adelaide Oval.

programme.title: The Ashes Live
programme.desc: Australia v England. Coverage of day four of the Third Test in the five-match series, held at Adelaide Oval . The last Ashes series to take place on Australian soil was in the 2021/22 season, and it saw the hosts secure victory in the third match, with a win by an innings and 14 runs in Melbourne giving them an unassailable 3-0 lead.

programme.title: Live Premier League
programme.desc: Newcastle United v Chelsea (Kick-off 12.30pm). All the action from the match at St James' Park. With each moment becoming critical as the ship flips upside down, Athena and Bobby take charge, seeking methods for rescue while navigating efforts to guide survivors to safety; Hen defies protocols in her search for Bobby and Athena.

Upon her return to shore, Athena's son finds himself in trouble with the law; Buck grows envious as Eddie forms a close bond with someone else; the team rescues a woman who's stuck on receiving a rose at an iconic mansion.

Hen and Karen welcome a new addition to their family; a call unfolds involving a person's limb that's taken on a mind of its own; Eddie and Marisol take a closer look at their relationship; Buck navigates his new feelings.

After years of anticipation, Maddie and Chimney's long-awaited wedding day arrives; when the groom mysteriously vanishes, the 118 races against time to ensure he doesn't miss the most crucial day of his life.
Maddie and Athena investigate a case surrounding an abducted mother and child; Hen and Karen learn more about Mara's family history; Eddie grapples with unresolved feelings for someone from his past.

After a victim of the apartment fire that changed Bobby's life resurfaces, he searches to make amends; driven by his need to right past wrongs, Bobby delves deep into memories of his childhood, unearthing moments from his fractured past.

The 118 and Tommy are presented with the Medal of Valor for their work on the cruise ship rescue; Hen and Karen encounter an unforeseen hurdle in their foster care journey; Eddie's emotional affair develops further.

Following the devastating fire at the Nash home, Bobby's fate remains uncertain; Athena embarks on a mission to uncover the truth; Hen and Karin engage in a heated custody battle; Christopher grapples with forgiving Eddie.
